title: Friday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
HYPERGAMOUSE Episode 97: Set Him Up

CHATEAU GRIEF Episode 243: Do You Even Rift?

WARDOGS INC. Episode 29: Enemy Spotted

THE SWORD OF GOD Episode 58: Deus Ex Doggo

First, Arkhaven is delighted to report that HYPERGAMOUSE is back from hiatus! The Dark Herald has more about it at the Arkhaven blog. Second, we’re now working with Castalia’s original artist to retroactively convert WARDOGS INC. to an illustrated episode format using a targeted AI style that he’s concocted, an example of which can be seen below and in this week’s episode.

DISCUSS ON SG
